inclusion.criterion: Able to read and understand English
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Total Fasting Plasma Cholesterol of 200 to 240 mg/dl
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing to maintain American heart Association (AHA) Step 1 diet for the duration of the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agree to abstain from consuming large amounts of grapefruit juice for the duration of the study.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any subject with an National Cholesterol Education Program (NCEP) 10-year cardiovascular (CV) risk > 10% will be excluded.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or nursing, or trying to get pregnant
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential (WOCBP) and who do not agree to use a reliable method of birth control during the study.
exclusion.label: triggers
